extendedInfo.description: Wild Crystal Zodiac is a 5-reel, 25-winline (limited to 5 lines at free version)slotgame. YOUR Zodiac is WILD!!!. 3 Difficulties are playable for Gamemodes Casino, Magic and Quick. Earn with your credits more winlines, higher bet and the pay 2 way feature.Casinomode: In Casinogame a classical slotgame will be simulated; your goal is to collect as much score as possible.Magicmode: Magic Game starts like Casino Game; when reelspin has stopped the player is able to change the position of symbols within a defined period: click at the first symbol, then click at the second symbol and symbols swap positions!Quickmode: Quick Game will be played like Casino Game, with one difference: Your Score will be calculated every 15 Spins at basegameWorldmode: Worldgame uses playpublicÂ´s PURE functionality where players in competition with other players all over the world.FOR AMUESMENT ONLY!!!

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: You cant win anything big and plus the buttons are too little. Needs upgrading fast... Uninstalling...
reviews.author: Ebony Scott

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: One of the worst apps on the market, do not download this app. It is terribly slow and pretty much impossible to play and get additional lines. First off, you start with 100 credits and can only bet 1 credit on only 3 lines. Secondly, you never win due to it being a 5 reel with so many symbols and only able to play 3 lines. Then it makes you have to get 1,000 credits in order to unlock lines 4 & 5. Absolutely terrible design.
reviews.author: peter black

reviews.title: SUCKS
reviews.comment: You can only play 3 lines out of 21.  Must buy app to play all lines.  Runs choppy and payouts are SMALL.  Not worth your time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your time down loading this game.
